We hereby confirm that the Hirer has settled in full the differential sum between the selling price of the vehicle and the hire purchase loan amount, and in consideration of your agreeing at out request to up-lift the e Ownership of above chassis number from Financial Information Services to enables us to register the vehicle to the above-named hirer with your ownership prior to the full settlement of the loan account, and we undertake the following:

1. To keep you indemnified against any losses that may be incurred by you in up-lifting the e-Ownership and in releasing the registration documents to us.

2. To deliver to you the Vehicle Ownership Certificate duly registered to the hirer's name with your ownership endorsed therein together with the duly signed hire-purchase agreement and all relevant documents within forteen (14) days from the date of upliftment of the e-Ownership by you.

3. To authorize you to set-off the proceeds from the hire-purchase disbursement in respect of the above-mentioned Hirer.

4. To settle you the differential sum between the capital financing redemption sum and hire-purchase loan amount; if any.

5. To full settle you in the event the Vehicle Ownership Certificate of the vehicle and all necessary documents are not furnished to you within forteen (14) days as per clause (2) above.

6. In the event the registration of chassis number for this vehicle is cancelled for whatever reason, you shall at your discretion re-lodged the e-Ownership into Financial Information Services under our account.

7. We further agree and undertake to perform and honour all obligations and responsibilities that we have agreed to undertake and/or assume so long as such commitment are made by our officers or managers for and on our behalf or in our Company’s name, and you are under no obligation and you do not owe us any duty to verify whether such officer(s) or manager(s) are duly authorized by us.

Thank you
Yours Sincerely,
